text: Chanverrie is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of La Verrie (the seat) and Chambretaud.Arrêté préfectoral 21 November 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Chanverrie
